plot: Alan seeks an immaculate engagement ring to satisfy a lifelong dream. Behind his search lies a bittersweet past, a passionate romance, and a truth of unconditional love.
title: Everything That I Am
plot_es: Alan seeks an immaculate engagement ring to satisfy a lifelong dream. Behind his search lies a bittersweet past, a passionate romance, and a truth of unconditional love.
plot_en: Alan seeks an immaculate engagement ring to satisfy a lifelong dream. Behind his search lies a bittersweet past, a passionate romance, and a truth of unconditional love.
